00028 #ifndef _Ogre_ILUtil_H__
00029 #define _Ogre_ILUtil_H__
00030 
00031 #include <OgrePrerequisites.h>
00032 #include <OgreCommon.h>
00033 #include <OgrePixelFormat.h>
00034 
00035 namespace Ogre {
00036 
00037     /* 
00038      * DevIL specific utility class
00039      **/    
00040     class _OgrePrivate ILUtil {
00041     public:
00043         struct ILFormat {
00045             ILFormat():
00046                 numberOfChannels(0), format(-1), type(-1) {};
00047 
00049             ILFormat(int channels, int format, int type=-1):
00050                 numberOfChannels(channels), format(format), type(type) {}
00051 
00053             bool isValid() { return format!=-1; }
00054 
00056             int numberOfChannels;
00058             int format;
00060             int type;
00061         };
00062 
00065         static PixelFormat ilFormat2OgreFormat( int ImageFormat, int ImageType );
00070         static ILFormat OgreFormat2ilFormat( PixelFormat format );      
00079         static void toOgre(const PixelBox &dst);
00080 
00085         static void fromOgre(const PixelBox &src);
00086     };
00087 
00088 }
00089 
00090 #endif
